decision: Scalability and Security: Configure autoscaling to dynamically adjust resources based on traffic patterns, ensuring consistent performance during surges. Enforce HTTPS for all communication, implement role-based access control (RBAC) for authorization, and secure sensitive data using encryption both invtransit and at rest. Use monitoring tools (e.g., AWS CloudWatch, Datadog) to track system performance and detect anomalies early.
